Montana Silversmiths classic buckle designs are the result of 45 years of buckle building excellence and our world class master engraving. The classic buckles section is filled with authentic detailed designs in a variety of rich jewelerâ€™s finishes. Select designs from our classic buckles include our hand-sculpted figures; miniature works of art that add an extra touch to the piece.
Made in the USA
When marked with this emblem it assures you and your customer that this piece is handcrafted and touched by as many as twenty-five caring sets of hands in our Montana Silversmiths facility in Columbus, Montana.
Classic Buckles
Warranty
Look for the Designerâ€™s MarkTM, a timeless Montana design minted on the back of select pieces, showcasing the artistry and grace of over 45 years of Montana Silversmiths bright-cut engraving.
Designerâ€™s Marktm Partners
Front
Back
Montana Silversmiths stands behind the quality and workmanship of our products proven with our offer of a limited lifetime warranty on our Montana Silversmiths brand name products against manufacturerâ€™s defects. See our warranty policy for details.
In the spirit of the West, we make this commitment to you: We will back our brand with national advertising to bring new customers to your stores.
Montana Armor
Â® MONTANA ARMORÂ®
Utilizing state of the art techniques gleaned from over 45 years in business, Montana ArmorÂ® extends the durability of each item against the effects of chemicals, tarnishing and abrasion. It preserves the original appearance and enhances the value of Montana Silversmiths products. CB02

GERMAN SILVER
German Silver is a trade name for full 18% Nickel polished to a jewelry finish. There is no silver in German Silver. Rope edges are hand applied jewelerâ€™s bronze. These individually crafted buckle's patina may vary. Buckles are shown at actual size.
